title: Anyone else getting FPS drops?
body: Recently I was playing a ranked game where suddenly my team started getting FPS drops, and so was I, all the way down to sub40 fps. I was wondering if this was something everyone was experiencing or just me.

replies.body: Have you resolved your problem? I have had this problem since beta client update. Tried going back to legacy. Tried different drivers. I also know its the game because I play Overwatch on max settings and get 90fps. I have used gpu-z and noticed that when i play overwatch, my card is being used at 99% , when I play league. its at 30%

Yes it has been happening to me for the past 2 days. After about 15 minutes my FPS drops from 120fps to 55, and then progressively gets worst the longer the game lasts. My FPS was down to 35 by the 38 minute mark. I've updated my graphics card driver and ran the repair tool, both don't seem to work. I have a 1070 so i'm like pretty sure it's not my computer. Also, this happens to everyone in the game. I ask multiple times every game and everyone says they're experiencing the same problem.
Without system specs, drivers, ect, nobody will be able to help.
